justConnectedModal.repositoryConnected:
**Functional Purpose**: Title of a modal confirming repository connection
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Just Connected Modal (header)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully connecting a GitHub repository
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Repository connected successfully!"
justConnectedModal.accountConnected:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains that the Exercism account is now linked to the chosen GitHub repository
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Just Connected Modal (body paragraph)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully connecting a GitHub repository
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "We've connected your Exercism account to your chosen repository."
justConnectedModal.happyWithDefaults:
**Functional Purpose**: Inquires if the user wants to initiate a backup immediately or configure settings first
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Just Connected Modal (body paragraph)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully connecting a GitHub repository
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "If you're happy with the defaults, you can back everything up now. Or you can tweak your settings, then use the button at the bottom of the settings page to back up later. Do you want to backup everything now?"
justConnectedModal.backUpEverythingNow:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to initiate an immediate backup of all data
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Just Connected Modal (action button)
**When Users See This**: In the modal presented after connecting a GitHub repository
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Back up everything now"
justConnectedModal.backUpLater:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to close the modal and postpone the backup
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Just Connected Modal (action button)
**When Users See This**: In the modal presented after connecting a GitHub repository
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Back up later"
